logo.name: CannabisSafe Logo
logo.description: A stylized cannabis leaf with a shield emblem representing safety and trust.

sections.title: The Ultimate Cannabis Experience
sections.subtitle: Personalized and Informed Choices
sections.name: HeroSection
sections.label: Home
sections.content: Discover the safe way to explore cannabis. **CannabisSafe** personalizes your experience by allowing you to select your preferred sources, THC levels, brands, outlets, and allergy considerations. Start your journey today!

images.name: Hero Image
images.description: A vibrant image of a cannabis plant with a rainbow of colors symbolizing variety and choice.

sections.title: About CannabisSafe
sections.subtitle: Our Mission to Your Safety
sections.name: AboutSection
sections.label: About
sections.content: **CannabisSafe** is dedicated to ensuring your cannabis experience is both enjoyable and safe. Our platform empowers users by providing an easy-to-use application to select preferences and avoid potential allergens. Our mission is to advocate for safe cannabis consumption for everyone.

images.name: About Infographic
images.description: An infographic showing the growth of cannabis safety awareness.

sections.title: Our Services
sections.subtitle: Tailored to Your Needs
sections.name: ServicesSection
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
1. **Preference Recording** - Select your preferred cannabis source, THC percentage, brands, and prices.
2. **Allergy Notifications** - Avoid unwanted reactions by notifying us of any additives you’re allergic to.
3. **Outlet Locator** - Find the nearest certified outlets carrying your preferred products.
4. **Brand Comparison** - Analyze and compare different brands based on your set preferences.

images.name: Service Images
images.description: Icons representing various services we offer.

sections.title: Real Experiences, Real Safety
sections.subtitle: Testimonials from Happy Users
sections.name: TestimonialsSection
sections.label: Testimonials
sections.content:
_“CannabisSafe has transformed how I shop for cannabis. No more guessing games - I know exactly what I’m getting!”_ - **Jane D.**

_“With my unique allergies, CannabisSafe gives me peace of mind to safely enjoy my favorite brands.”_ - **Alex P.**

images.name: User Testimonials

sections.title: Explore Our Offers
sections.subtitle: Get Started on Your Safe Cannabis Journey
sections.name: CallToActionSection
sections.label: Get Started
sections.content: Join thousands of users who enjoy a personalized and safe cannabis experience. [Start Now](#) and take control of your cannabis journey.

images.name: Join Now Banner
images.description: A motivating graphic encouraging users to start their journey.

sections.title: Pricing Plans
sections.subtitle: Find the Right Option for You
sections.name: PricingSection
sections.label: Pricing
sections.content:
**Free Plan** - Basic access, record preferences and allergies.

**Premium Plan** - $9.99/month, access to brand comparison and outlet locator.

**Enterprise Plan** - Custom, tailored solutions for large groups or organizations.

images.name: Pricing Details
images.description: A detailed image showing the different pricing plan tiers.

sections.title: FAQs
sections.subtitle: Your Questions, Answered
sections.name: FAQSection
sections.label: FAQ
sections.content:
**How do I record my cannabis preferences?**
- Use our easy interface to add your preferences in the app.

**How does CannabisSafe ensure my safety?**
- We use data-driven technology to monitor and warn about potential allergens.

images.name: FAQ Icons
images.description: Small icons representing frequently asked questions.

sections.subtitle: We'd Love to Hear from You

Follow us on [Twitter](#), [Facebook](#), and [Instagram](#).
